thread.title: BUZZ-Oil producers and service providers: pain again
thread.title_full: BUZZ-Oil producers and service providers: pain again

title: BUZZ-Oil producers and service providers: pain again
text:
-3.6620 
(Updates prices, adds analyst comments) 
** Oil producers and oilfield service providers down as U.S (Other OTC: UBGXF - news ) . crude oil prices fell below $42 a barrel after new build in U.S. stockpiles put global glut back in focus 
** U.S. crude last down 16 cents at $42.07 a barrel. Brent futures were trading at $49.33 barrel 
** Oil support services down 1-2 pct, BG, Royal Dutch Shell (LSE: RDSB.L - news ) down 0.4-0.8 pct while BP and Tullow Oil (LSE: TLW.L - news ) fall 1.1 pct 
** Weir Group top loser on the FTSE-100, down 1.5 pct, after Liberum cuts PT and keeps its sell rating 
** Liberum analyst Jack O'Brien says co's high-margin aftermarket rev from its minerals division at risk from further customer deferrals and falling order intake 
** Oil services company Petrofac (Amsterdam: PF6.AS - news ) falls 1 pct while Amec Foster Wheeler (Other OTC: AMCBF - news ) sheds 1.1 pct 
** FTSE 350 Oil & Gas Financial index down about 1 pct, with Hunting (Other OTC: HNTIF - news ) leading the decline 
** Stoxx 600 Oil & Gas index falls 0.7 pct with Seadrill (Hamburg: 2171269.HM - news ) down 2.7 pct and among the heaviest decliners across major European shares (RM (LSE: RM.L - news ) : aastha.agnihotri.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net)
